      • isAuthorized

        public boolean isAuthorized(UserLevel userLevel)
        Description copied from interface: IDaylightWeb
        This method checks if the user is authorized to access the bundle.
        Specified by:
        isAuthorized in interface IDaylightWeb
        Parameters:
        userLevel - user role level in the controller space.
        Returns:
